thread.section_title: SpareFoot Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of SpareFoot | www.sparefoot.com | 5 of 801
thread.title: eric gruenwald

author: eric gruenwald
title: eric gruenwald
text:
I waited 10-15 minutes at a locked office door because I was told by the phone operator that they'd be open for the next hour ( I was 10-12 minutes away)
When the agent got to me, she told me that she'd charge me extra because she could not sogn me up before her shift ended. I should come back another day.
I went to one of your competators and signed up in less than 15 minutes for a much cleaner facility at a lower price.
Thank you for turning me away with poor customer service.
